doc.previous: Solving this optimization problem see Lagrange multipliers results in the Kriging system
doc.after: Simple kriging is mathematically the simplest but the least general It assumes the expectation of the random field to be known and relies on a covariance function However in most applications neither the expectation nor the covariance are known beforehand
